General.Name: Pao Nauchno-Proizvodstvennaya
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Research and Production Corporation United Wagon Company engages in the freight car building business in Russia and internationally. The company offers gondolas, hoppers, tank cars, platforms, box and dump cars, bogies, car castings, and bogie suspension springs. It also sells and leases railcars; generates power; and issues debt securities. In addition, the company provides goods transportation; utilities; and engineering and construction services. Public Joint Stock Company Research and Production Corporation United Wagon Company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
